A year ago, Josefina M. started selling cosmetics by catalogue in order to help her husband, who works as a carpenter, with the family expenses. They wanted to give their son a better quality of life. Thanks to Josefina’s dedication, she has increased her sales, offering her customers more products.

She is requesting a loan of $475.00 USD, which she will repay in 6 monthly installments, in order to purchase more merchandise. This way, she can offer her services to more people and generate more income for her family.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

Josefina M. inicio su negocio hace 1 año vendiendo cosméticos por catalogo para ayudarle a su esposo en los gastos familiares quien trabaja como carpintero y buscando darle una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo; gracias a la dedicación de Josefina fue incrementando su nivel de ventas y ofreciendo un mayor numero de productos a sus clientes.

Esta solicitando un crédito de US $475 que pagara en un plazo de 6 meses lo necesita para surtir mercancía y así poder ofrecer sus servicios a más gente, obteniendo mejores ingresos para su familia.

loans.use: Purchase merchandise

loans.name: Diego

texts.es:
In the municipality of El sauce of the city of León lives the gentleman, Diego F., who is dedicated to the business of farming, having his small cattle on his farms which allows him to maintain his family in the condition that they deserve. From his youth he has been dedicated to this business. Being the head of the house and seeing the need for electric power to live in a rural zone, he requests the installation of a solar panel that will permit him to obtain electric power for the lighting of the home and to carry out the tasks of the house.

Once the solar panel is installed in their home, Diego will repay the loan. For this reason he seeks support from Ceprodel. They need your support to allow them to give him the loan and to give him the benefit of electric power in order to carry out the daily tasks of the home and also so that his children can study in the afternoons and the nights.

Translated from Spanish by B, Kiva Volunteer.

En el municipio de El sauce de la ciudad de León habita el caballero Diego F. dedicándose al negocio agropecuario teniendo su pequeño ganado en sus fincas con el que permite mantener su familia en las condiciones que esta se merece. Desde joven se ha dedicado a este negocio y por ser la cabeza del hogar al ver la necesidad de no tener energía eléctrica por vivir en una zona rural, solicita la instalación de un panel solar que le permita obtener energía eléctrica para la iluminación del hogar y llevar a cabo los quehaceres de la casa.

Una vez con el panel solar instalado en su hogar de habitación, el señor Diego debe de pagar tal deuda y por este motivo busca apoyo en Ceprodel para recibir apoyo con crédito que le permita salir de esta deuda y sacarle el provecho a la energía eléctrica para realizar los quehaceres diarios del hogar y además para que sus hijos puedan estudiar por las tardes y las noches.

loans.use: To buy a solar panel for his home, so that he can carry out the daily work of the house and so that his children can study in the afternoons and nights.

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for CEPRODEL - Oct 26, 2008)

loans.name: Karla Patricia

texts.es:
Karla F. is a lady that, since her childhood, has grown up in the municipality of El Sause in the city of León. She has been dedicated to agriculture. That is the business that permits her to make a living for her home and thus to maintain her two small children (a youth of 15 years and a boy of 3 years.)

It is apparent in the area where she lives, one can not count on electric power because they are very rural. She has very wisely decided to acquire a solar panel to obtain lighting and so that her children can study with no problem. Upon acquiring the panel, she will repay the debt very responsibly. For that reason she has applied to Ceprodel to obtain a loan that will give her the benefit of electric power for her tasks in the home and for her daughter to study.

Translated from Spanish by B, Kiva Volunteer.

Karla F. es una dama que desde su niñez se ha desarrollado en el municipio de El Sauce de la ciudad de León dedicándose a la actividad de la agricultura que es el negocio que le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar y así mantener a sus dos pequeños hijos (una jovencita de 15 años y un niño de 3 años.)

En vistas a que en el local donde ella vive no se cuenta con energía eléctrica por estar muy alejado, ella muy sabiamente decidió adquirir un panel solar para obtener iluminación y que sus hijos puedan estudiar sin ningún problema. Al adquirir el panel, muy responsablemente debe de cancelar esta deuda y por este motivo es que acude a Ceprodel para obtener créditos que le permitan cancelar esta deuda y así sacarle el provecho a la energía eléctrica para sus quehaceres del hogar y para el estudio de su hija.

loans.use: To buy a solar panel for her house,

payments.comment: scheduled_repayment (late autopay posting for CEPRODEL - Oct 25, 2008)

loans.name: Leonto Leonel

texts.es:
Leonto R. is described as a hard-working gentlemen who has for quite a while dedicated himself to agriculture in his home town of the municipality of El Sauce in the city of León.

Mr. R. and his family are currently in need of assistance: since they live in an area where there is no conventional electricity, they have requested the installation of a solar panel to help out with household chores and the children's studies. That's why they're turning to Ceprodel to earn credits that will permit them to get out of the debt they acquired with the panel; that way he can provide his family with better conditions in life so that his children can study in the afternoon and evenings, become great professionals, and make their dear father's dreams come true.

Translated from Spanish by Shannon Skoglund, Kiva volunteer.

Leonto R. se caracteriza por ser un caballero muy trabajador que desde hace mucho tiempo se dedica al negocio de la agricultura en su local de habitación en la ciudad de León específicamente en el municipio de El Sauce.

Una necesidad por la que transcurre el señor R. y su familia es que a pesar que viven en un local donde no se cuenta con energía eléctrica han solicitado que le instalen un panel solar para apoyarse con los quehaceres del hogar y el estudio de sus hijos por tal razón acude a Ceprodel para obtener crédito que le permita salir de esta deuda que contrajo con la adquisición del panel y así poder brindarle a su familia mejores condiciones de vida para que sus hijos puedan estudiar por las tardes y noches para llegar a ser grandes profesionales que es el sueño de su querido padre.

loans.use: Pay for a solar panel for their home.

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es:
Since his childhood, Mr. Marcos F. has dedicated his life to agriculture and cattle ranching in the municipality of El Sauce in the city of León. He is a married father and carries the responsibility of providing for his family's quality of life; they depend on his agricultural income.

Ever since they have lived in this location, they have had problems with the absence of electricity, since they live in a remote, rural area. To get around this issue, Mr. Marcos requested the installation of a solar panel. Once received, he must be very responsible about paying this debt, and that's why he is seeking the help of Ceprodel in earning credits that will help him cover his debt, and so contribute to improving his household's condition.

Translated from Spanish by Shannon Skoglund, Kiva volunteer.

El caballero Marcos F. desde su juventud ha dedicado su vida a la labor de la agricultura y ganadería en el municipio de El Sauce en la ciudad de León. Es padre casado y con la responsabilidad de llevar el sustento a su hogar brindando todas las condiciones de vida a su familia que dependen de sus ingresos en su labor de agricultura.

Desde que viven en su localidad siempre han tenido el problema de la inexistencia de la energía eléctrica por estar ubicados en una zona rural muy alejada. Para evitar tal problemática, el señor Marcos solicitó la instalación de un panel solar que al ser otorgado debe muy responsablemente pagar esta deuda y por este motivo busca apoyo en Ceprodel para obtener créditos que le permitan cubrir la deuda y de esta manera contribuir con el mejoramiento de las condiciones de su hogar.

loans.use: Pay for a solar panel to provide his household with electricity.

loans.name: José Luis

texts.es:
Jose Luis is a young man who has been a farmer since he was a child, as has his family for many years. His daily routine helps him to increase his earnings for his young family; and now even more that he has heard that he is going to be a father. The good news brought happiness to his home, but also concern due to all the expenses and savings required to welcome the baby. He is requesting a loan in order to increase his work capital and make more money during harvesting.

Translated from Spanish by Veronica MR, Kiva volunteer

Jose Luis, es un joven que desde niño se dedicó a la agricultura, labor que es ejercida por toda su familia desde años atrás, su desempeño diario lo ayuda a incrementar los ingresos para su joven familia y ahora más que nada al enterarse que pronto podrá disfrutar de la dicha de convertirse pronto en padre. Esta noticia trajo gran alegría a su hogar, pero también trajo bastante preocupación debido a los gastos y ahorros que tienen que hacer para la llegada del bebé. Su petición de un préstamo atiende a la necesidad de incrementar su capital de trabajo y en consecuencia sus ganancias durante la época de cosecha.

loans.use: Increase capital to increase his family earnings

loans.name: Fredy

texts.es:
Fredy is a hard-working family man that worries daily, about the growth of the corn in his field. He also worries about his two little children who are the reason why he goes on with this honorable task with the goal to provide his children with a better life and with better possibilities for their individual development. This need has become his goal, and this is why he's requesting the loan.

Translated from Spanish by Veronica MR, Kiva volunteer

Fredy, es un empeñoso padre de familia, que día a día se preocupa por el crecimiento del maíz en sus tierras de cultivo además de sus dos pequeños niños, por quienes ha decidido continuar en esta noble labor con el objetivo de otorgarles un nivel de vida mejor y con mejores posibilidades para su desarrollo individual.A esta necesidad que se ha convertido en un anhelo, atiende la solicitud de un préstamo.

loans.use: Increase capital to increase his corn production

loans.name: Mercedes Del Carmen

texts.es:
Mercedes M. devotes herself to being a homemaker for her two children and her husband. He has worked in agriculture since he was very young, and he is currently in the city of León, municipality of Sauce.

It's important to note that since she lives in this rural area, she does not have electricity. Since having electricity is very useful, she decided to get a solar panel on credit so that she could have access to two lamps and a television. On taking on this debt, Mercedes turned to Ceprodel to gain credit that would cancel this debt. The credit will make sure her children are able to take advantage of this energy for their studies at night after their chores are done.

Translated from Spanish by Shannon Skoglund, Kiva volunteer.

La actividad a la que se dedica la señora Mercedes M. es a ser ama de casa teniendo dos hijos y su esposo que trabaja en la agricultura desde muy joven en la ciudad de León específicamente en el municipio de el Sauce.

Es de mucho interés destacar que desde que vive en esta localidad por estar ubicada en zonas rurales no posee energía eléctrica y por ser tan útil este servicio, decide adquirir un panel solar al crédito para lograr tener acceso a dos lámparas y un televisor. Al contraer la deuda, la señora Mercedes acude a Ceprodel para obtener crédito que le permita cancelar esta deuda y lograr que sus hijos aprovechen la energía para sus estudios por las noches además para realizar los quehaceres del hogar.

loans.use: Pay for a solar panel to provide her household with electricity

loans.name: Constantino

texts.es:
Constantino and his lovely wife have been cultivating corn since they began their lives together. Thanks to their efforts, their children have been able to prosper and form their own families. Today their work helps them take care of their daily needs and allows them to buy the medicine they need for their health. Your support will help them improve the quality of their harvest by enabling them to purchase a greater quantity of fertilizers to protect their crops.

CONSTANTINO y su adorable esposa, desde que unieron sus vidas para formar una familia se dedican a sembrar maíz y arvejas en sus tierras de cultivo, gracias a su desempeño sus hijos han podido desarrollarse y conformar sus propias familias. Hoy su actividad les otorga el sustento diario y la posibilidad de adquirir las medicinas necesarias para aplacar las dolencias propias de su salud.Tu importante ayuda servirá para incrementar la calidad de sus productos con la compra de mayor cantidad de abonos y fertilizantes naturales.

Translated by Kiva volunteer, Emily Charnes

loans.use: To purchase natural fertilizers to help produce a good harvest.

loans.name: Paz Anabell

texts.es:
Paz Anabell lives in El Sauce, city of León. Her home is in this town and she needs to support her family because she is a single woman. For this reason she works in farming and also sometimes washes clothes when people ask her to.

For a long time she didn't have electricity in her house since the community she lives in is far away from the urban area. In order to solve this problem, she has requested the installation of a solar panel in her house and is asking CEPRODEL for help in order to get a loan that may allow her to pay for her debt and finish paying for the solar panel. This will allow her to have non-interrupted electric energy at her house that will allow her to iron, has light during the day and at night.

Translated from Spanish by Veronica MR, Kiva volunteer

La dama Paz Anabell es residente del municipio El Sauce en la ciudad de León teniendo su casa de habitación en esta localidad y con la necesidad de mantener a su familia ya que es una dama soltera que se dedica al negocio de agricultura y además en ocasiones al lavado de ropa cuando se lo solicitan.

Por mucho tiempo ha atravesado la situación de la inexistencia de energía eléctrica en su comunidad ya que se encuentra muy alejada de la zona urbana. Para solucionar esta problemática ha solicitado la instalación de un panel solar y busca apoyo en CEPRODEL para obtener crédito que le permita salir de esta deuda y así lograr pagar el panel y tener acceso sin problemas a la energía en la que la puede aprovechar para planchar, iluminarse y hacer uso de la luminaria por las noches.

loans.use: Payment for her house's solar panel

loans.name: Marcial

texts.es:
Marcial is the caring father of a family. His young child suffers from an illness and Marcial works very hard each day with the only objective being to help him feel better and recover. Marcial cultivates corn and potatoes, and with the loan he will be able to increase the quantity of his production and continue to help his child.

Marcial, es un empeñoso padre D. familia, que lleva el triste dolor D. L. enfermedad D. su pequeño en su corazón y por quien se ha propuesto esforzarse día a día y sin tregua alguna con el único objetivo D. ayudarlo a sentirse mejor y a tener esperanza D. pronta mejoría.Siembra papa y maíz anualmente y su deseo es incrementar L. cantidad D. sus productos para cumplir con su propósito.

loans.use: TO BE ABLE TO CULTIVATE GREATER QUANTITIES OF POTATOES AND CORN.

loans.name: Angelica

texts.en:
Angelica F. F. runs a stand selling fruits and vegetables at Market Huequito in the neighborhood of Comercio in Tarapoto, San Martin. She rents the space in the market where she sells a variety of fresh fruits and vegetables from all over the tropical region of San Martin.  

Angelica is 43, married and has one young child.  She was raised by an adopted family, and was not treated the same as the other relatives. She was not given many opportunities and had to work hard to survive. Angelica waited to have children until her financial situation improved, so that her children would not suffer and would have more opportunities than she did.

A member of the community bank Manos Unidas, Angelica is requesting a loan of s/ 3000 (US$1,050) to be repaid in 6 months. She plans to purchase higher-quality produce for sale, and, in the future, save enough to be able to buy a house and send her son to University.

loans.use: Purchase of high-quality produce

loans.name: Victoriano

texts.es:
Victoriano M. is a hard-working man who, since he was a child, has worked as a farmer in the field and with cattle. He has a house in El Sauce, city of León.

Mr. M. is married and has five children. He says that he works very hard to provide his family with the best possible lifestyle so they can develop and be great professionals and so they don't have to go through all the adversities he has gone through.

It is important to note that since Mr. M.'s house is located far away from the urban area he doesn't have electricity, and this is why he is asking Ceprodel to help him to get a loan to responsibly pay for the solar panel he has bought.

With the solar he will be able to power two lamps and a little TV. Thanks to the solar panel the situation at his home will improve since they will no longer need to use candles. The use of the solar panel will benefit him and his children who need it so much because they are students.

Translated from Spanish by Veronica MR, Kiva volunteer

Victoriano M. se caracteriza por ser un caballero muy trabajador que desde su niñez se ha desarrollado en el trabajo del campo en la agricultura y la ganadería teniendo su propia casa de habitación en la ciudad de León en el municipio de El Sauce.

Es un caballero casado y con cinco hijos a su cargo que lucha grandemente por brindarles un mejor estilo de vida para que puedan desarrollarse y llegar a ser grandes profesionales evitando atravesar situaciones adversas como las ha atravesado él según comenta.

Es necesario destacar que la necesidad que atraviesa es que por vivir en una lugar alejado de la zona urbana no cuenta con energía eléctrica para su iluminación y es por tal razón que acude a Ceprodel para obtener un crédito ya que ha adquirido un panel solar y muy responsablemente debe de honrar esta deuda.

Con el panel solar es necesario destacar que tiene lugar para instalar dos lámparas y un pequeño televisor. Ya con esto hace posible la mejora en su hogar por el hecho de que ya no necesitará candiles para iluminarse sino que hará uso del panel solar para beneficio propio y de sus hijos que tanto lo necesitan por estar en etapa estudiantil.

loans.use: To pay for a solar panel for his house

loans.name: Manuel

texts.es:
Manuel is a young farmer and driver. While he is away at his transportation job for long periods of time, his wife takes care of the land. This business provides for the care and development of their small children. Your support will help improve the quality of their products, and allow them to invest in their business.

MANUEL, es un joven agricultor y transportista, durante sus largos periodos de ausencia su querida esposa se dedica al cuidado y siembra de sus tierras de cultivo debido a que esta actividad es una de las que mejores réditos les proporciona para el normal desarrollo de sus dos pequeñas niñas.Tu aporte contribuirá a mejorar la calidad de sus productos e incrementará su número con la compra de bueyes luego de tu importante aporte.

loans.use: TO INVEST IN HIS FARMING BUSINESS WHICH SUPPORTS HIS WIFE AND TWO YOUNG CHILDREN.

loans.name: Candy

texts.es:
Candy is a hard working mother. She dedicates herself to the cultivation of her lands with the help of her oxen. She would like to increase the quantity and quality of her products to improve the quality of life for her family. This loan will enable her to invest in the business.

Doña Candy, es una trabajadora madre de familia que desempeña con satisfacción en sus tierras de cultivo gracias a la ayuda de sus bueyes, el deseo de incrementar la calidad y cantidad de sus productos para generar mayor bienestar a su querida familia, a esta razón atiende la solicitud de un préstamo.

Translated by Kiva volunteer, Emily Charnes

loans.use: TO INVEST IN HER FARMING BUSINESS AND INCREASE THE QUANTITY AND QUALITY OF HER PRODUCTS.

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty P. D. V. sells women’s underwear, clothing, and shoes at her home in the neighborhood of Fonavi, outsiD. the city of Tarapoto, San Martin. She started the business ten years ago in order to help increase her family’s income and gain more independence as a woman.
	
Betty is 46 years old, happily married, and has three children. All of her children are students, and she is happy that she has been able to work from home where she can look after them and help them study. Betty is friendly, charismatic, and trusted in the community. Clients go out of their way to shop at her house. Her self-esteem has soared in the last few years, and she hopes that all of her family will be able to advance in life.
	
A member of the community bank Manos Unidas, Betty is requesting a loan of s/ 1000 to be repaid over 6 months. With the loan, she will buy women’s jeans, underwear, and collared shirts for sale.

loans.use: Purchase of women’s jeans, underwear, and collared shirts

loans.name: Marlene

texts.en:
Marlene S. P. makes custom bed, sofa, and pillow covers in the city of La Banda de Shiclayo, San Martin. She has been running the business for 15 years. She does not advertise much, because she does not need to: her clients spread the word about her quality goods.

Marlene is 44 years old, married, and has 3 children. She loves working from home where she can spend time with her family. The money Marlene makes she saves for her children’s education. Marlene feels lucky that she had the opportunity to start a business and help her family. She enjoys building relationships with her clients and has gained new self-confidence.  

A member of the community bank Manos Unidos, Marlene is requesting a loan of s/2500 to be repaid over 6 months. She will use the loan to buy an industrial sewing machine. With the new machine, she will be able to significantly increase production.

loans.use: Purchase of an industrial sewing machine to expand production

loans.name: Wilma

texts.es:
Wilma works hard for her family. Thanks to her business raising guinea pigs, she has been able to provide for her children's necessities. In her home, with the care and nutritious food she gives to the guinea pigs each day, they have grown large and are reproducing quickly. She would like to improve the space where she raises the small animals. With the loan, she hopes to become one of the large exporters of guinea pigs in her city.

Wilma es una noble dama que se preocupa por la integridad de sus seres queridos, gracias a su desempeño en la crianza de cuyes ha podido alcanzar el objetivo de cuidar a su familia y brindarles lo necesario para su pleno desarrollo. En su casa debido a los cuidados y a la nutritiva comida que les da día a día sus pequeños compañeros han alcanzado gran tamaño y se están reproduciendo muy rápido. Su deseo de incrementar y mejorar los espacio de crecimiento de sus cuyes la conducen a solicitar un préstamo con el sueño de convertirse pronto en la más grande exportadora de cuyes de su ciudad.

loans.use: TO INVEST IN HER BUSINESS RAISING GUINEA PIGS.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan is a hardworking farmer. For a long time his land has been the only way to sustain his family. Now, with some training, he has decided to also raise guinea pigs to increase his income and the quality of life for his family. Right now, the space in his house is not set up properly to raise the number of animals he has in mind. With this loan, he will be able to realize his new business objectives.

JUAN, es un notable agricultor y sus tierras durante mucho tiempo han sido el único sustento para su familia; ahora gracias a la capacitación que recibió a decidido criar cuyes en casa a fin de incrementar sus ingresos y el nivel de vida de su familia, pero tiene un gran inconveniente el espacio de su casa no está adecuado para albergar al número de cuyes que tiene en mente comprar y precisamente a esta razón atiende su petición. Tu aporta podrá convertir el deseo de este noble agricultor en realidad.

Translated by Kiva volunteer, Emily Charnes

loans.use: TO PREPARE A SPACE IN HIS HOME FOR RAISING GUINEA PIGS, INCREASEING HIS INCOME AND IMPROVING THE QUALITY OF LIFE FOR HIS FAMILY.

loans.name: Libertad

texts.en:
Libertad S. lives in the jungle city of Tarapoto, San Martin, where she bakes and sells delicious empanadas, pies, and cakes. She bakes her treats at home and sells them from a store she owns next door, as well as distributes them to popular coffee houses thoughout the city. She has been running the business for 13 years and has many faithful clients.

Libertad is 50 years old, divorced, and has three children. She loves her business and would not want to be doing anything else. She is happy with all the friends she has maD. running a business and the self-confidence it has given her. Her children are now adults and live independently, but often help her out when they can.  

A member of the community bank Manos Unidos, Libertad is requesting a loan of s/ 1000 to be repaid over 6 months.  With this loan, she will purchase a new oven. One day, she hopes to open a small restaurant.

loans.use: Purchase of a new oven

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth M. R. runs a general store in the town of Picota, San Martin. At the store she sells primary-need goods like canned food, pasta, fruit, and toiletries. Ruth has been running the business for 10 years and now has many loyal customers. These customers are happy that they do not need to walk to the main market on the other side of town.

Ruth is 54 years old, married, and has 5 children. She is happy she has been able to work and help her family. Over the years she has made countless friends and been able to save for her children’s education. Ruth is happy that she will be able to give her children more opportunities than she had.

A member of Manuela Ramos and the community bank Mujeres En Accion, Ruth is requesting a loan of s/1000 to be repaid over 6 months. She will use the money to buy olives, eggs, rice, oil, and other goods for sale.

loans.use: Purchase of olives, eggs, rice, and oil

loans.name: Margarita

texts.en:
Margarita M. V. runs a family business producing butter, cheese, and yogurt in the town of Picota, San Martin. She started the business in 2002 after running a dairy for many years. She knew she could do more with the business, so she talked her family into expanding the operation. They now deliver dairy products all over the region.

Margarita is 29 years old, happily married, and has one child. She is happy she can work at home with her family. She enjoys being creative and building relationships with clients. One day, her children will have the opportunity to run the business, but they will all be attending University first.   

A member of Manuela Ramos and the community bank Mujeres en Accion, Margarita is requesting a loan of s/1000 to be repaid over 6 months. With the loan, she will buy ingredients for yogurt.

loans.use: Purchase of ingredients for yogurt

loans.name: Isabel

texts.en:
Isabel T. V. runs a restaurant from her home in Picota, San Martin. She serves dishes typical of the region, including Juane (chicken and rice wrapped in palm leaf), meat on a stick, soups, and many others. She started the business 10 years ago and has plenty of loyal customers.

Isabel loves cooking and serving people her delicious meals. She is 40 years old, married and has 3 children. Her family is very supportive of her work and often help her out. She is proud of her business and her ability to pay for her children’s education.

A member of Manuela Ramos and the community bank Mujeres En Accion, Isabel is requesting a loan of s/ 800 to be repaid over 6 months. She will use the money to buy food ingredients for the restaurant and to make some home repairs.

loans.use: 1) Purchase of ingredients for a restaurant, and 2) home repair

loans.name: Lucinda

texts.en:
Lucinda A. M. raises and sells chickens in the town of Picota, San Martin. She started the business three years ago, because she wanted to help her family and her sick husband. Despite having no previous business experience, she worked hard, asked a lot of questions, and was able to develop a successful business. Now she sells hundreds of chickens every month.

Lucinda is 54 years old, married, and has 4 children. She says that she has never felt better and that her self-esteem is at an all time high. She is proud of her business and happy that she can save money for her children’s education.

A member of Manuela Ramos and the community bank Los Claveles, Lucinda is requesting a loan of s/ 1500.00 to be repaid over 6 months. She will use the loan to buy chicken feed.

loans.use: Purchase of chicken feed

loans.name: Carmen

texts.en:
Carmen P. D. runs a small restaurant from her living room in the town of Picota, San Martin. She serves meals typical of the region, including many different soups, and chicken, fish, and rice dishes. She started the business 3 years ago and now has many loyal customers.

Carmen is 40 years old, married, and has 5 children. She started the business, because she loves to cook and make people happy. She also wanted the family to have a second income. Education is very important in her family, so Carmen is proud she can pay for her children to go to school.

A member of Manuela Ramos and the community bank Los Claveles, Carmen is requesting a loan of s/ 1000 to be repaid over 6 months. She will use the loan to buy food ingredients and to fix the restuarant bathroom.

loans.use: 1) Purchase of ingredients for a restaurant, and 2) repair of the restaurant bathroom

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita T. C. runs a general store in the town of Picota, San Martin. At the store, which is in an excellent location, she sells goods of primary need. Rosita's clients are happy that they do not need to travel across the town to the main market to buy goods.  

Rosita is 38 years old, married and has two children. She started the business 3 years ago, because she wanted to help her family and gain some independence. Now she can save money for her children’s education and give them more opportunities in life than she has had.

A member of Manuela Ramos and the community bank Los Claveles, Rosita is requesting a loan of s/ 1700 to be repaid over 6 months. With the help of the extra money, she will buy oil, sugar, and rice.

loans.use: Purchase of oil, sugar, and rice for sale

loans.name: Nery Marlith

texts.en:
Nery Marlith R. A. owns a business where she distributes beer and soda in the jungle city of Tarapoto in the State of San Martin. She runs the business from her house where she has plenty of space. Nery supplies bars and large parties with their favorite beverages, including Coke, Pepsi, Cuscana, and Pilsen.  

Nery is 36 years old and has two children. She is happy that she can work from home where she can look after her young children and help them study. Nery is hard-working and receives little help. She loves finding new clients and building relationships with them. Her business is her family’s only source of income.

A member of the community bank Las Orquidias, Nery is requesting a loan of s/ 1000 to be repaid over 6 months. She will use the money to buy more soda and beer to respond to the excess demand.

loans.use: Purchase of soda and beer for sale

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.es:
Cecilia is a farmer and her performance is admirable for the big courage that she puts to her work. In spite of having two very small children, this does not limit her work and an example of this is to see her with her young child in her arms choosing the useful potatoes seeds for the next farming season for her land. The intense cold weather hitting her city and the lack of a fumigation tool notably limits the development of her work. Precisely for these urgent needs she is requesting a loan.

Translated from Spanish by Ana Gabriela Clark, Kiva Volunteer.

Cecilia, es agricultora y su desempeño en ella es admirable por el gran ánimo que le pone a su labor; a pesar de tener dos hijos muy pequeños no limita su trabajo y muestra de ello es verla con su hijo en brazos escogiendo las semillas de papas útiles para el próximo sembrío en sus terrenos,.El inmenso frío que azota su ciudad y la falta de una herramienta fumigadota limitan notablemente el desarrollo de su labor y precisamente a esta urgente necesidad atiende su pedido.

loans.use: Buy a fumigation tool

loans.name: Nely

texts.es:
Nely was able to have a family with her only and big love of her life. During a long time they both struggled in his farming land to increase little by little their family’s standard of living. Unfortunately, her husband is been ill lately and the need of medicine and attention has increased alarmingly in these past months. Nely wants to help to improve her husband’s health but she lacks resources to do it. For this reason she is requesting a loan to increase the quality of her products by buying bigger quantities natural fertilizers.

Translated from Spanish by Ana Gabriela Clark, Kiva Volunteer.

Nely, ha conformado una familia con el único y gran amor de su vida. Durante mucho tiempo ambos se han esforzado en sus tierras de cultivo para incrementar poco a poco su nivel de vida familiar, este propósito a sido un factor de esfuerzo constante pero por desgracia a causa de los continuos malestares de su querido esposo ha decaído ya que las necesidades de medicina y atención se han incrementado alarmantemente en estos meses. Nely, desea contribuir a mejorar y restablecer dentro de poco la salud de su esposo pero le faltan recursos para llevar a cabo este propósito y la razón de su petición de un préstamo atiende al objetivo de incrementar la calidad de sus productos con la compra de mayor cantidad de abonos y fertilizantes naturales.

loans.use: Buy natural fertilizers.

loans.name: Bedith

texts.es:
Señora Bedith belongs to a communal bank called 'Women Leaders' located in the district of Calleria in the state of Ucayali. She's 28 years old and she has one son. Her husband is a salesman. With the first loan she obtained from Manuela Ramos, she decided to buy and sell lubricants for mototaxis.

She currently has a locale where she sells lubricants and accessories for mototaxis. Her husband helps her from time to time in taking care of the customers.

With this loan, which she will repay in 6 months, she will purchase more supplies for moto-taxis such as lubricants of different name brands and switches, etc.

Translated from Spanish by Carolina Zelaya-Kronlund, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Bedith pertenece al Banco Comunal Mujeres Lideres, ubicado en el Jr Unión N° 10,del Distrito de Calleria,Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 28 años tiene un hijo, su esposo es comerciante. Ella con el primer préstamo recibido de Manuela Ramos S/. 300 decidió invertir en la venta de Lubricantes para motocarro. En la actualidad ella cuenta con un local de venta de lubricantes y accesorios para motocarros, Su esposo la ayuda en la atención del negocio. Con este préstamo de S/. 1,700 el cual será pagado en 6 meses, comprara accesorios para motocarros como: aceite de diferentes marcas, llaves para ruedas y otros

loans.use: To purchase supplies for moto-taxis

loans.name: Ubaldina

texts.es:
Ubaldina has been working in agriculture the past eight years after the father of her small girl left. She sows corn and potatoes that she then commercializes at the local market. She is doing really well because of the quality of her products. The desire to increase the quantity of her products in order to cover the school needs that her small girl is starting to demand made her request a loan.

Translated from Spanish by Ana Gabriela Clark, Kiva Volunteer.

Ubaldina, a consecuencia del abandono del padre de su pequeña niña, hace ocho años se dedica a las labores agrícolas en su tierra natal, siembra maíz y papa que luego comercializa en el mercado local obteniendo muy buena acogida por la calidad de sus productos. El deseo de incrementar la cantidad de sus productos para alegría y atención de las necesidades escolares que inicia a demandar su pequeña niña la conducen a solicitar un préstamo para llevar a cabo su propósito.

loans.use: Increase of working capital to increase the quantity of her products.

loans.name: Faustino

texts.es:
Faustino used to work in agriculture and transportation. He had to stop due to a terrible accident that he suffered in company of his young son who regrettably lost his life aboard of his vegetable transportation vehicle. After a long time, he has decided to undertake this work once again. He is sowing potatoes, corn, among other vegetables. His desire to acquire more tools and get the money needed to buy a vehicle made him request a loan.

Translated from Spanish by Ana Gabriela Clark, Kiva Volunteer.

Faustino, hace tiempo atrás desempeñaba labores agrícolas y de transporte, actividades que interrumpió por un grave accidente que sufrió en compañía de su menor hijo quien lamentablemente perdió la vida a bordo de su vehículo de transporte de vegetales. Después de mucho tiempo ha decidido emprender una vez más este trabajo y ha sembrado papa, maíz , entre otros vegetales. Su deseo de adquirir otra herramienta de trabajo lo conducen a solicitar un préstamo para completar la suma del costo de un vehículo.

loans.use: Increase working capital and be able to buy a car.

loans.name: Amadeo

texts.es:
Amadeo is a man dedicated to agriculture with lots of experience. He had six children and now he enjoys the company of his beloved wife in his humble dwelling. He still works sowing his fields and from it, he obtains what he needs to cover the basic needs at home. His desire is to increase the quality and quantity of his products; for this reason he is requesting a loan.

Translated from Spanish by Ana Gabriela Clark, Kiva Volunteer.

Amadeo es un hombre dedicado a la agricultura con mucha experiencia; tuvo seis hijos y ahora goza de la compañía de su querida esposa en su humilde morada; aún se dedica a cultivar sus campos y de ella obtiene el sustento diario para su hogar. Su deseo de incrementar la calidad y cantidad de sus productos lo conducen a solicitar un préstamo.

loans.use: Increase the working capital to increase the quality and quantity of this products.

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
Julio, he is a humble farmer who works very hard in this farming land. Like any other farmer, he receives the profit of his work at the end of the harvest period and during the waiting period he has do other activities. He wishes to acquire a pair of oxen to optimize the sowing in his farming fields and for this reason he is requesting of a loan.

Translated from Spanish by Ana Gabriela Clark, Kiva Volunteer.

Julio, es un humilde agricultor que cuida afanosamente sus terrenos de cultivo. Como todo agricultor recibe las ganancias de su labor al término de la temporada de cosecha y durante el período de espera tiene que dedicarse a otras actividades. Anhela adquirir un par de bueyes para optimizar la siembra de productos en sus campos de cultivo y a esta razón atiende la petición de un préstamo.

loans.use: Buy a pair of oxen.

loans.name: Adelma

texts.es: ADELMA, desde hace dos años se dedica al alquiler de mototaxis para transportar a las personas de su comunidad a sus diferentes destinos, con estas herramientas obtiene diariamente el sustento necesario para sus pequeños hijos, lamentablemente de un tiempo a esta parte su familia a tenido serias dificultades económicas debido a los desperfectos que han ido manifestando las motos. Con el deseo de mejorar su capacidad y ofrecer un mejor y rápido servicio solicita un préstamo para poner en marcha su plan de reparación.

loans.use: Reparación de sus herramientas de trabajo.

loans.name: Adelma

texts.es: ADELMA, desde hace dos años se dedica al alquiler de mototaxis para transportar a las personas de su comunidad a sus diferentes destinos, con estas herramientas obtiene diariamente el sustento necesario para sus pequeños hijos, lamentablemente de un tiempo a esta parte su familia a tenido serias dificultades económicas debido a los desperfectos que han ido manifestando las motos. Con el deseo de mejorar su capacidad y ofrecer un mejor y rápido servicio solicita un préstamo para poner en marcha su plan de reparación.

loans.use: Reparación de sus herramientas de trabajo.

loans.name: Adelma

texts.es:
For the past two years, Adelma has rented mototaxis to transport people from the community to their various destinations. With these taxis, she earns a daily living for her young children. Unfortunately, for some time now, her family has had serious financial difficulties due to defects with the mototaxis. With a desire to improve the capacity of her business and offer better, faster service, she is seeking a loan to put her repair plan into action.

Translated from Spanish by Amani Roland, Kiva volunteer.

ADELMA, desde hace dos años se dedica al alquiler de mototaxis para transportar a las personas de su comunidad a sus diferentes destinos, con estas herramientas obtiene diariamente el sustento necesario para sus pequeños hijos, lamentablemente de un tiempo a esta parte su familia a tenido serias dificultades económicas debido a los desperfectos que han ido manifestando las motos. Con el deseo de mejorar su capacidad y ofrecer un mejor y rápido servicio solicita un préstamo para poner en marcha su plan de reparación.

loans.use: Mototaxi repair

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es:
Josefina is a loving and caring mother who works as a farmer planting citrus in her fertile land. When the fruit is ripe, she distributes it at the local market as well as at small grocery stores. Since marrying, she has been living in her sister-in-law’s house, but her sister-in-law, who relocated for work reasons, will be returning soon. Josefina urgently needs to increase her production in order to build a small house on land that she owns. Your help will enable this selfless mother realize her dream of having her own home.

Translated from Spanish by Amani Roland, Kiva volunteer.

JOSEFINA, es una amorosa y tierna madre que se desempeña como agricultora sembrando cítricos en sus fértiles tierras, cuando alcanzan su madurez los distribuye en el mercado de su localidad y en las pequeñas bodeguitas también. Desde que contrajo matrimonio ha estado habitando la casa de su cuñada, quien por motivos laborales radicaba en otra ciudad ahora a su pronto retorno Josefina está muy preocupada ya que le urge incrementar su producción para acondicionar una pequeña casita en el terreno que posee.Tu ayuda contribuirá a alcanzar el sueño de una casa propia a esta abnegada madre.

loans.use: To increase citrus production

loans.name: Juana Maria

texts.es:
Mrs. Juana Maria M. A. is native to the city of Bluefields. She is 38 years old, is married to Mr. Gerardo Castro, and they have four children.  For the last seven years, Mrs. M. has been the owner of a small general store whose customers are the other residents of the neighborhood. They prefer her because she offers a variety of products. 
At this time, Mrs. M. needs to buy a 2 units of rice at $45 each, 1 unit of sugar at $37 each, 1 drum of oil at $41 each, 1 unit of flour at $48 each, 1 unit of salt at $7 each, 3 boxes of sauces at $9 per box, 3 cases of soap at $16 each, 3 dozen units of spaghetti at $12 per unit, 7 cases of cookies at $8 each, 2 sacks of detergent at $9 each, 1 package of bleach at $10 each, 2 packages of toilet paper at $12 each, 1 box of sanitary napkins at $10 each, 1 packets of disposable diapers at $6 each, 1 dozen tubes of toothpaste at $10 per dozen, and 50 pounds of chicken at $1 per pound. 
With this investment she will be able to satisfy the demands of her customers. 
Translated from Spanish by Shannon Skoglund, Kiva volunteer. 

La Sra. Juana Maria M. A. es originaria de la ciudad de Bluefields, tiene 38 años de edad, esta casada con el Sr. Gerardo Castro ambos tiene 4 hijos. La Sra. M. desde hace 7 años es propietaria de una pulpería teniendo como cliente a los habitantes de su barrio que la prefieren por ofrecer una variedad de productos en estos momentos la Sra. M. necesita comprar 2 quintales de arroz a $ 45.00 dólares el quintal, 1 quintal de azúcar a $37.00 dólares el quintal, 1 bidón de aceite a $ 41.00 dólar el bidón, 1 quintal de harina a $48.00 dólares el quintal, 1 quintal de sal a $7.00 dólares el quintal ,3 cajas de salsa a $ 9.00 dólares la caja,3 cajas de jabón a $16.00 dólares la caja  ,3 cajas de sopas a $11.00 dólares la caja, 3 docenas de espagueti a $ 12.00 dólares la docena,7 cajas de galletas a $ 8.00 dólares la caja,2 bolsones de detergente a $9.00 dólares el bolsón, 1 bolsa de cloro a $10.00 dólares la bolsa, 2 bolsones de papel higiénico a $ 12.00 dólares el bolsón, 1 caja de toalla sanitaria a $ 10.00 dólares la caja, 2 paquetes de pañales desechables a $6.00 dólares el paquete, 1 docena de pasta dental a $10.00 dólares la docena y 50 libras de pollo a $ 1.00 dólar la libra con esta inversión podrá satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes.

loans.use: Purchase a wide variety of goods for her small grocery/general store to meet her customers' needs.

payments.comment: El pago real es de $ 46.66 dólares.
El pago real es de $ 46.66 dólares.
La cuota real de pago es de $ 46.66 dólares

loans.name: Daniela

texts.es:
Daniela works diligently caring for small animals at a facility in her home, animals which she then sells at various fairs in the area. She shows the same dedication to the small creatures that she shows to her small children, and, in a short amount of time, they have provided her with excellent earnings. She is eager to increase the capacity of her animal care facilities to accommodate a greater number of animals. With your strong support, she will be able to achieve her goal.

Translated from Spansish by Amani Roland, Kiva volunteer.

DANIELA, se desempeña en las instalaciones de su hogar diligentemente en la crianza de animales pequeños que comercializa en las diferentes ferias de su localidad, los pequeños animalitos a los cuales les presta la misma dedicación que a sus pequeños hijos le han otorgado en poco tiempo excelentes ganancias y está deseosa de incrementar la capacidad de sus instalaciones para poder albergar mayor cantidad de ejemplares. Con tu importante apoyo podrá lograr lo que se ha propuesto.

loans.use: To improve animal care facilities.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es:
Teodora is 53 years old, and she busies herself very ably in the small bodega that she opened long ago in her humble home. Demand for products is common; even more so now that she has become well know for the kindness with which she offers her services. She wants to increase the quality and quantity of her products to improve the quality of her business and for this reason she is seeking your help.

Translated from Spanish by Amani Roland, Kiva volunteer.

TEODORA, tiene 53 años de edad y se desempeña muy hábilmente en la pequeña bodeguita que instaló hace mucho tiempo en su humilde domicilio, la demanda de productos es frecuente y aún más ahora que se ha hecho muy conocida por la amabilidad con el que brinda sus servicios. Desea incrementar la calidad y cantidad de sus productos para mejorar la calidad de su atención y con este propósito recorre en búsqueda de tu ayuda.

loans.use: To offer a greater quantity of products.

loans.name: Joilith

texts.es:
Every day Joilith sells groceries and goods to fulfill people's basic needs. She is a 27 year old mother of 2. She works to increase her income and convert her small convenient store into a mini-supermarket. She also works to improve her children's quality of life. In order to achieve her goals, she is requesting this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Alison Rives, Kiva Volunteer.

La venta de abarrotes y productos de primera necesidad es la rutina diaria que desempeña la señora Joilith de 27 años de edad, quien es madre de 02 niños. Se desempeña diariamente con el objetivo de incrementar sus ingresos y convertir su pequeña bodega en un minimercado además de elevar la calidad de vida de sus pequeños.Para iniciar el cumplimiento de gran propósito solicita una suma de dinero en préstamo.

loans.use: Injection of funds to convert her small convenient store into a mini-supermarket

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
Olga loves her work and puts a lot of effort into it. This has allowed her to accomplish everything she has set out to do. Along with her dear husband, she runs a grocery store and now also rents out rooms. Both Olga and her husband want to continue to succeed and have decided to keep on working hard and ask for a loan to upgraD. their work site to offer better service to their community.

Translated from Spanish by Alison Rives, Kiva Voluneer.

Su desempeño y amor al trabajo le ha posibilitado alcanzar cada una D. las cosas que se ha propuesto a Olga, en compañía D. su querido esposo se desempeña en su bodega y ahora también se dedican al alquiler D. cuartos, ambos tienen el deseo D. continuar por el camino del progreso y han decidido seguir esforzándose y solicitar un préstamo para acondicionar sus espacios D. trabajo y brindar un mejor servicio a su comunidad.

loans.use: Injection of funds to upgrade work site

loans.name: Catalina

texts.es:
Catalina is 28 years old. Every day she divides her time between tending her small grocery store and selling prepared meals from home with the help of her beloved husband. Not long ago they had to overcome a terrible illness affecting the husband, and they have now decided to strive towards improving the quality of life for their young children. The loan requested will help increase the number of goods at the grocery store.

Translated from Spanish by Alison Rives, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Catalina de 28 años de edad, divide su tiempo diario para dedicarse a la atención de su pequeña bodega y a la venta de platos preparados en su domicilio con ayuda de su querido esposo, hace poco han superado la penosa enfermedad por la que atravesaba su esposo y ahora han decidido esforzarse más para elevar el nivel de vida de sus pequeños hijos. La solicitud de un préstamo atiende a la necesidad de incrementar la cantidad de artículos de su bodega.

loans.use: More goods for the small grocery store

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
Gloria is a 41-year-old mother of 5. She makes garments out of the modest facilities she has outfitted in her home. Every day she receives orders from friends and other clients. This is why she has decided to purchase a recovering and darning machine to satisfy her clients with improved finished garments in less time.

Translated from Spanish by Alison Rives, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Gloria de 41 años de edad es madre de 5 hijos, confecciona diversas prendas en las instalaciones del humilde taller que ha acondicionado en su hogar, a diario recibe pedidos de sus amigos y clientes y por esa razón ha decido adquirir una máquina remalladora y una recubridora a fin de otorgarle mejores acabados a cada una de sus prendas en menor tiempo para satisfacción de sus clientes.

loans.use: To buy a recovering and darning machine.

loans.name: Melva

texts.es:
Melva sells a variety of goods, especially candies, cookies, sodas, etc. near a school. She has become the top seller in the area. In order to offer more goods, she is requesting this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Alison Rives, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Melva oferta diversos productos y en especial caramelos, galletas, refrescos, etc, cerca de un centro de estudios y se ha convertido en la mejor comerciante de esa zona. Su deseo de incrementar su capital para ofertar mayor cantidad de productos la conducen a solicitar un préstamo.

loans.use: To be able to offer more goods

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.es:
Eduardo is a hard-working young man who has helped strengthen the family business over many years. Now he has decided to set off on his own by buying some animals that he will raise for a short period of time in order to sell at his city's large stock shows. He wants to become the best rancher which is why he requests a loan with which he will increase the number of animals that he is able to raise.

Translated from Spanish by Alison Rives, Kiva Volunteer.

Eduardo, es un joven trabajador que luego de haber contribuido con la consolidación del negocio familiar por mucho tiempo, ha decidido emprender su camino de comercialización con la compra de algunos animales a los que acogerá por un corto período a fin de ofertarlos en las grandes ferias ganaderas de su ciudad.Su deseo de convertirse en el mejor criador lo conducen a solicitar un préstamo para incrementar el número de animales que alberga.

loans.use: To purchase more animals

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana would very much like to advance her cattle raising business, which she started some time ago when she decided to start a business separate from that of her parents. She started out by buying one cow and now has four. She plans to buy another cow in order to increase her cattle business and your collaboration will be extremely important in helping her achieve that goal.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Chegezy, Kiva volunteer.

Juana, tiene muchos deseos de progresar con su labor ganadera, hace tiempo decidió independizarse del negocio de sus padres y adquirir una vaca ahora tiene 4 y tiene proyectado adquirir una más para iniciar su gran proyecto ganadero en compañía de sus vaquitas.Tu colaboración será muy importante para alcanzar este sueño.

loans.use: Purchase of a cow.

loans.name: Magaly

texts.es:
Magali is a young mother who works hard every day to give her daughter the best. Along with her husband, Magali has worked for the last two years making tiles and bricks. Her products are of such high quality that in record time she has become one the best brick and tile makers in her area. Magali wants to be able to educate her daughter, who is now 3, and is therefore seeking a loan to purchase supplies for tile making. Please consider helping Magali so that she can continue to make progress in her work.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Chegezy, Kiva volunteer.

Magali es una joven madre que se esfuerza cada día para ofrecer a su única niña lo mejor de su trabajo, ella y su esposo decidieron hace 2 años dedicarse de manera independiente a la fabricación de tejas y ladrillos, la calidad de sus productos ha hecho que en tiempo récord se convierta en una de las fábricas más sobresalientes de su zona, el deseo de Magali es poder educar a su niña que ahora tiene 3 años, solicita un préstamo para invertirlos en la compra de insumos para la fabricación de tejas. Apoya a Magali a continuar y alcanzar el progreso.

loans.use: Purchase of supplies to make tiles

loans.name: Bertha

texts.es:
From a very young age, Bertha has been involved in farm and agricultural work, due to her beloved parents' hard work in that sector. Currently, Bertha has five cows but she would like to own more. Therefore, due to her economic situation, she is seeking a loan to meet that goal.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Chegezy, Kiva volunteer.

Bertha, desde muy pequeña ha estado vinculada a las labores agrícolas y ganaderas gracias al buen desempeño de sus queridos padres en este campo. Actualmente tiene cinco vacas y su deseo de seguir incrementando el número de las mismas y las condiciones de su desarrollo la conducen a solicitar un préstamo.

loans.use: Purchase of a cow

loans.name: Emilda

texts.es:
Señora Emilda belongs to the communal bank called 'Women Leaders' located in the district of Calleria in the state of Ucayali. She's 61 years old and a mother of 9 children. Her husband is a salesman. With the first loan she obtained from Manuela Ramos, she opened up a small grocery store.

She currently sells home cooked meals and basic fool supplies out of her store. Her day begins early in the morning to prepare her dishes and to take care of her store.

With this loan, which she will repay in 6 months, she will purchase more basic supplies such as rice, sugar, cooking oil, refreshments, pastries, etc.

Emilda is a happy woman since her business is moving along just fine. She's able to proviD. for her children and her family, and they are very happy for her.

Translated from Spanish by Carolina Zelaya-Kronlund, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Emilda pertenece al Banco Comunal Mujeres Lideres, ubicado en el Jr 7 D. Junio Nº 663, del Distrito D. Calleria del Departamento D. Ucayali. Tiene 61 años y es madre D. 9 hijos, su esposo es comerciante. Ella con el primer préstamo recibido D. Manuela Ramos S/. 300 decidió invertir en una pequeña bodega. En la actualidad ella cuenta con un puesto D. venta D. comida y abarrotes, se levanta muy temprano para preparan sus comidas, y irse a atender también su pequeña bodega. Con este préstamo D. S/. 1,600 el cual será pagado en 6 meses, comprara abarrotes como: arroz, azúcar, aceite, gaseosas, y pasamanería, etc. Emilda esta muy feliz, su negocio crece cada día, ahora pueD. dar a sus hijos todo lo que necesitan, su familia esta feliz por ella.

loans.use: To purchase more inventory

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
With the help of her beloved husband, Norma works providing transportation services with her own vehicle. Her daily work has allowed her to improve her family's economic situation and to save money for the nobel goal of purchasing another automobile. However, due to rising costs, Norma is seeking a loan to be able to afford the vehicle and achieve her goal.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Chegezy, Kiva volunteer.

Norma, con la ayuda de su querido esposo se dedica a trabajar brindando servicios de movilidad a su querida comunidad con su vehículo. Su desempeño diario le ha permito mejorar la situación económica de su hogar y le ha dado la oportunidad de ahorrar también, con el noble deseo de adquirir una herramienta de trabajo más; debido a que el costo de este inmueble se ha elevado solicita una cantidad de dinero como préstamo a fin de completar la suma y alcanzar su deseo.

loans.use: Purchase of a vehicle

loans.name: Consuelo

texts.es:
Señora Consuelo belongs to the communal bank called 'Women Leaders' located in the district of Calleria in the city of Ucayali. She's 24 years old and a mother of 2 children. Her husband is a salesman.

She currently has a locale at the local supermarket where she sells home cooked meals. Her day begans very early in the morning so that she can prepare the meals she will sell during the daytime. In the evenings, she buys all the ingredients she will need to prepare her dishes.

With this loan, which she will repay within 6 months, she will purchase basic ingredients such as rice, sugar, flour, eggs, cooking oil, chicken, fish, etc.

Consuelo is a hard-working woman, and she's very happy to belong to a communal bank because she likes all the women who are members.

Translated from Spanish by Carolina Zelaya-Kronlund, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Consuelo pertenece al Banco Comunal Mujeres Lideres, ubicado en el Mercado Nº 3, del Distrito de Calleria del Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 24 años y es madre de 2 hijos, su esposo es comerciante. En la actualidad ella cuenta con un puesto en el mercado Nº 3 de venta de comida, se levanta muy temprano para preparar sus comidas, y en las tardes sale a comprar sus víveres que necesitara para la preparación de sus comidas. Con este préstamo de S/. 1,300 el cual será pagado en 6 meses, comprara víveres como: arroz, azúcar, harina, huevos, aceite, pollo, pescado, etc. Consuelo, es una mujer muy trabajadora y esta contenta de pertenecer a un banco comunal por que tiene buenas compañeras y se siente muy feliz.

loans.use: To puchase basic food ingredients

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.es:
Every day, along with her husband, Rosalina works hard in her humble home in order to improve her children's lives. She sells sweaters in various colors, styles and sizes at the different markets in her city, and thanks to her high quality workmanship and good taste, she is getting more and more orders. She wants to be able to fill all of these orders and increase her business, and is therefore requesting this loan.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Chegezy, Kiva volunteer.

Rosalina en compañía de su querido esposo se desempeña a diario en su humilde hogar con el deseo de contribuir con la superación de sus queridos hijos. Oferta diversos colores, modelos y tallas de chompas en las diferentes ferias de su ciudad y gracias a la calidad de las mismas y a su buen gusto han incrementado la cantidad de sus pedidos.Su deseo de cumplir y ampliar su radio de trabajo lo conducen a solicitar un préstamo para adquirir mayor cantidad de prendas de las diversas personas que se desempeñan en esta labor en sus respectivos hogares y de las cuales Rosalina y su esposo se han convertido en sus mejores clientes.

loans.use: Additional funds to be able to sell more sweaters

loans.name: Modesta

texts.es:
Modesta, a mother, was very concerned when her family's household needs were not being met. So, in addition to caring for her family, she decided to start her own business. At first, she sold nice clothing without much success, so she decided to knit sweaters in various colors and designs and sell on a smaller scale. Thanks to continued business from her customers and her great desire to get ahead and improve her business, she was driven to seek a loan in order to buy more raw materials and be able to fill all of the orders that she has received.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Chegezy, Kiva volunteer.

Modesta, es una madre de familia muy preocupada que observando la insatisfacción de las necesidades de su hogar decidió emprender un negocio sin descuidar los requerimientos de los miembros de su familia, fue así como al principio ofertaba prendas de vestir sin acoger buenos resultados, entonces decidió tejer chompas de diversos colores y diseños para ofertarlos en menor escala fue así como gracias a las solicitudes de sus clientes y a su gran ánimo por mejorar y progresar con su labor la conducen a solicitar un préstamo para adquirir mayor cantidad de materia prima a fin de concretar cada una de las solicitudes que ha ido albergando.

loans.use: Purchase of additional raw materials

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
Señora Gladys belongs to the communal bank called 'Women Leaders' located in the district of Calleria in the city of Ucayali. She's 48 years old and a mother of 5 children. Her husband drives a moto-taxi.

She currently has a business manufacturing furniture. Her day begans very early by first making breakfast for her family, then she makes furniture along with her children. Once a furniture piece is done, then they go out to the different neighborhoods in the city to sell it.

With this loan, which she will repay within 6 months, she will purchase wood, basic materials for furniture making and she'll pay a transportation service fee.

Gladys feels great and comments that Manuela Ramos has given her a great support not only to her but to all the women in general who want to work and become independent.

Translated from Spanish by Carolina Zelaya-Kronlund, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Gladys pertenece al Banco Comunal Mujeres Lideres, ubicado en el Jr. Cajamarca 148, D. Distrito de Calleria D. Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 48 años y es madre de 5 hijos, su esposo es motocarrista. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de elaboración de muebles, se levanta muy temprano para preparar el desayuno de sus hijos y esposo, junto con sus hijos de dedican a la confección de los muebles, una vez terminados salen a venderlos en los diferentes sitios de la ciudad. Con este préstamo de S/. 1000 el cual será pagado en 6 meses, comprara maderas, materiales para la confección de sus muebles y el servicio de transporte. Gladys se siente muy bien dice que Manuela Ramos es un gran apoyo a todas las mujeres por que las ayuda poner su negocio y les da la posibilidad de trabajar y ser independientes

loans.use: To purchase wood and basic materials for furniture making

loans.name: Nicida

texts.es:
Señora Nicida belongs to the communal bank called "Women with Perseverance 2" which is located in the district of Yarina Cocha in the city of Ucayali. She's 32 years old and she's a mother of 3 children. Her husband is a salesman.

She currenly has a small place where she sells natural remedies/medicine. She opens up her store at about 8:00 in the morning, and then in the evenings she collects money from people who owe her money.

With this loan, which she will repay within 4 months, she will purchase more natural remedies/medicine such as a box of tonics, 2 boxes of capsules for different illnesses, etc.

Nicida is very happy since her business keeps growing daily. She can provide her children with basic necessities. Her family is very happy for her.

Translated from Spanish by Carolina Zelaya-Kronlund, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Nicida pertenece al Banco Comunal Mujeres Preserverantes 2, ubicado en la Carretera Antigua de Yarina Cocha 290, del Distrito de Yarina Cocha del Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 32 años y es madre de 3 hijos, su esposo es comerciante. En la actualidad ella cuenta con un local donde vende sus productos de medicina natural, abre su local a las 8 am., y en las tardes se dedica a la cobranza de sus créditos que deja a algunas de sus clientas. Con este préstamo de S/. 1000 el cual será pagado en 4 meses, lo invertira en la compra de medicinas naturales como: 1 caja de tónicos, 2 cajas de cápsulas, para diferentes enfermedades. Nicida esta muy feliz, su negocio esta creciendo sus ventas aumentan y todo el esfuerzo que realiza es para darles una buena educación y futuro a sus hijos.

loans.use: To purchase more natural medicine to sell

loans.name: Luz Aurora

texts.es:
Señora Luz belongs to the communal bank called "Women Leaders" which is located in the district of Yarinacocha in the city of Ucayali. She's 41 years old and she's a mother of 4 children. Her husband drives a moto-taxi.

She currenly has a small place where she sells home cooked meals. She gets up at dawn to prepare the dishes she will sell during the day, and then in the evenings she takes care of her children and her home.

With this loan, which she will repay within 6 months, she will purchase more basic supplies such as rice, sugar, flour, eggs, cooking oil, chicken, refreshments, etc.

Luz is very happy since her business keeps growing daily. She can provide for her children with the basic necessities. Her family is very happy for her.

Translated from Spanish by Carolina Zelaya-Kronlund, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Luz pertenece al Banco Comunal Mujeres Lideres, ubicado en el Jr Prolongación Tupac Amaru Mz 185 Lt 7, del Distrito de Yarinacocha del Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 41 años y es madre de 4 hijos, su esposo es motocarrista. En la actualidad ella cuenta con un pequeño puesto de venta de comida, se levanta en la madrugada para preparar las comidas que llevara a vender a su puesto, y por las tardes se dedica a sus hijos y su hogar. Con este préstamo de S/. 1,000 el cual será pagado en 6 meses, lo invertirá en la compra de víveres como: arroz, azúcar, harina, huevos, aceite, pollo, gaseosas, etc. Luz esta muy feliz, su negocio crece cada día, ahora puede dar a sus hijos todo lo que necesitan, su familia esta feliz por ella,

loans.use: To purchase basic ingredients to prepare home cooked meals

loans.name: Simi

texts.es:
Señora Simi belongs to the communal bank called 'Women Leaders' located in the district of Calleria in the state of Ucayali. She is 34 years old and she's a mother of three children. Her husband is a salesman.

she currently has a business selling basic food supplies. Her day begins at 7:00 in the morning. She makes breakfast for her husband and children, and then she takes care of her business.

With this loan, which she will repay within 6 months, she will purchase more items such as rice, sugar, milk, noodles, cooking oil, pork meat, etc.

She's very happy because her business keeps growing daily. She can provide for her children basic necessities. Her family is very happy and proud of her. Her biggest wish is to one day own her own locale.

Translated from Spanish by Carolina Zelaya-Kronlund, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Simi pertenece al Banco Comunal Mujeres Lideres, ubicado en el Jr Comandante Suárez No 255, del Distrito de Calleria del Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 34 años y es madre de 3 hijos, su esposo es comerciante. En la actualidad ella cuenta con un negocio de venta de abarrotes al por menor, se levanta a las 7.00am para preparar el desayuno de sus hijos y su esposo, luego se dedica a la atención de su negocio. Con este préstamo de S/. 1,000 el cual será pagado en 6 meses, lo invertira en la compra de abarrotes como: arroz, azúcar, leche, fideos, bidones, ropas, aceite quemado, carne de chancho, res, etc. Ella esta muy contenta porque su negocio crece cada día, ahora puede complacer a sus hijos en todo lo que necesitan, su familia esta feliz y orgullosos de ella, su mayor anhelo es comprar su propio local

loans.use: To purchase more inventory

loans.name: Paula

texts.es:
Mrs. Paula belongs to the communal bank “Las Caribenas” located on block 9 of Jr. Athahualpa, in the district of Calleria, in the department of Ucayali. She is 35 years old and a mother of 2 boys. Her husband also works as a merchant.

Presently Paula owns a small hardware store. She wakes up very early so she can take care of her children, her husband and complete all of her household chores. When she leaves her house in the afternoons she sells her products to her customers.

She then dedicates all of her time and energy to her business. In the afternoons she also goes to collect money from customers that bought on credit. With this loan of 1800 Soles, which she will pay in 4 months, she will buy nails, paint, tar, tubes, and metal rods.

She feels very happy with her business. When she began her business she didn’t image that this would give her so much personal satisfaction.

Translated from Spanish by Gabe of San Roque High School, Kiva volunteer

La señora Paula pertenece al Banco Comunal Las Caribeñas, ubicado en el Jr. Atahualpa Cdra. 9, del Distrito de Calleria del Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 35 años es madre de 2 hijos, su esposo es comerciante.

En la actualidad cuenta con una ferretería, se levanta muy temprano para atender a sus hijos y esposo, luego se dedica a la atención de su negocio también va a cobrar sus créditos que deja a sus clientes.

Con este préstamo recibido de S/. 1,800, el cual será pagado en 4 meses, comprara clavos, pintura, brea, tubos, fierros, etc.

Paula se siente muy contenta, cuando inicio su negocio no imagino que le iba a dar tantas satisfacciones y logros personales.

loans.use: purchasing products

loans.name: Tania

texts.es:
Mrs. Tania belongs to the communal bank “Mujeres Perservantes 2” (the perserverant women) , located in the building “Los Unidos”, in the district of Yarina Cocha, in the department of Ucayali. She is 32 years and is the mother of 3 children and a husband.

Presently, she sells beauty products. She wakes up very early to take care of her children and perform her domestic duties. In the afternoons, she leaves her home to offer products to her customers.

With a loan of 1000 Soles, which she will repay in 4 months, she will invest one part in the purchase of beauty products (like lipsticks, colognes, perfumes, eye shadows, etc.), and she will invest the other part in fixing up her house.

Tania feels very happy because her business in growing and this brings her a felling of tranquility and also helps her to support her family.

Translated from Spanish by Gabe of San Roque High School, Kiva volunteer

La señora Tania pertenece al Banco Comunal Mujeres Perseverantes 2, ubicado en el Asentamiento Humano Los Unidos Mz. C Lt. 2, del Distrito de Yarina Cocha del Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 32 años y es madre de 3 hijos, su esposo es counter,

En la actualidad ella vende productos de belleza, se levanta muy temprano para atender a sus hijos y realizar los quehaceres domésticos, y por las tardes se dedica a salir a ofrecer sus productos a sus clientas.

Con este préstamo de S/. 1000 el cual será pagado en 4 meses, lo invertirá una parte en las compra de productos de belleza como labiales, colonias, talcos, perfumes, sombras, etc., y otra parte lo destinara para el arreglo de su casa.

Tania se siente muy contenta por que su negocio crece, y eso le brinda tranquilidad tanto económica como familiar.

loans.use: invest in beauty products

loans.name: Bertha

texts.es:
Mrs. Bertha belongs to a communal bank named “Juntas Hasta el Final” (together until the end), located in Jr. Zarumilla 144, in the district of Calleria in the department of Ucayali. She is a 65 year-old married woman who has 4 children. Her husband is driver, but his daily income is not enough to cover for the daily expenses. That is why Bertha with the first loan of 300 Soles she decided to invest in the preparation and selling of candy and other goodies. At the moment she continues preparing her candies and selling her goodies at her house. Her children help her make the candies and she can she goes out and buys the other goodies to sell. In the afternoons she sells these candies and goodies. With the loan of 1,000 Soles, which she will pay back in 5 months, she will invest it in buying, 1 sack of flour, 1 sack of sugar, eggs, butter, baking powder, milk, vanilla, and other goodies in general. Bertha is a good example of a hard-working woman. Despite her age she says she still feels young and with a lot of energy to keep working, and thanks to Manuela Ramos she feels more independent and confident about herself.

Translated from Spanish by Mariela of San Roque High School, Kiva volunteer

La señora Bertha pertenece al Banco Comunal Juntas Hasta el Final, ubicado en el Jr. Zarumilla 144, del Distrito D. Calleria del Departamento D. Ucayali. Tiene 65 años es casada, tiene 4 hijos, su esposo es chofer, pero el ingreso que tiene no le alcanza para su economía diaria, es así que Bertha con el primer préstamo recibido D. Manuela Ramos S/. 300 decidió invertir en la preparación y venta D. dulces y golosinas. En la actualidad sigue preparando sus dulces y vendiendo sus golosinas en su casa, con la ayuda D. sus hijos prepara sus dulces y cuando pueD. sale a comprar sus golosinas, en las tardes se dedica a la venta D. sus productos. Con este préstamo recibido D. S/. 1,000, el cual será pagado en 5 meses, lo invertirá en la compra D.: 1 saco harina, 1 saco D. azúcar, huevos, mantequilla, polvo D. hornear, leche, vainilla, y golosinas en general. Bertha es un ejemplo D. mujer trabajadora, a pesar D. su edad ella dice que se siente joven y con muchas energías para seguir trabajando, y gracias a Manuela Ramos se siente una mujer mas independiente y segura D. sI misma.

loans.use: Buying products for her general goods store.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es:
Mrs. Angela belongs to a communal bank named “ LasTriunfadoras”, located in Marketplace #2, in the meat section, in the district of Calleria, in the department of Ucayali. She is 53 years old and a mother of 7 children. Her husband has passed away. At the moment she has a meat stand. She wakes up early in the morning and works at her meat stand and in the afternoons she dedicates her time to her children and also takes care of her domestic chores. With the loan of 1,000 Soles, which she will pay back in 5 months, she will invest it in buying beef, heart meat and liver meat. Angela is very happy with her business because it supports her family. The business provides the economic stability that she’s always wanted, and she can also give her children a good education.

Translated from Spanish by Mariela of San Roque High School, Kiva volunteer

La señora Ángela pertenece al Banco Comunal Las Triunfadoras, ubicado en el Mercado N° 2 sección carne, del Distrito de Calleria del Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 53 años es madre de 7 hijos, su esposo es fallecido En la actualidad tiene un puesto de venta de carne de res, se levanta muy temprano para ir a su puesto de venta y en las tardes se dedica a sus hijos y a los quehaceres de su hogar. Con este préstamo recibido de S/. 1,000, el cual será pagado en 5 meses, lo invertirá en la compra de carne de res, vísceras, mondongo, corazón, hígado. Ángela se siente muy contenta con su negocio porque es un gran apoyo, le da una estabilidad económica que siempre quiso, puede darles una buena educación a sus hijos.

loans.use: She will invest in buying beef.

loans.name: Gilma

texts.es:
Señora Gilma belongs to the communal bank “Juntas Hasta el Final”, located in Jr. Zarumilla 150, in the district of Calleria, and in the Department of Ucayali. She is 32 years of age and is single.

Presently she has a business of selling soft drinks, goodies, and also sells used clothes. Each month goes on two business trips to different communities on the Ucayali river. The income that her business provides her with is good.

With a loan of 1,700 Soles, which she will repay in 5 months, she will invest it in purchasing used clothing and snack foods to sell.

In general, Gilma feels very happy, she business is going well and she hopes to that it will continue to grow so that she will be able to live a calm and worry-free life.

Translated from Spanish by Johnny of San Roque High School, Kiva volunteer

La señora Gilma pertenece al Banco Comunal Juntas Hasta el Final, ubicado en el Jr. Zarumilla 150, del Distrito de Calleria del Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 32 años es soltera.

En la actualidad tiene un negocio de venta de gaseosas y golosinas, y también vende ropa usada, cada mes realiza dos viajes a los diferentes caseríos del rió Ucayali, pero sin descuidar su otro negocio que también le da muy buenos ingresos.

Con este préstamo recibido de S/. 1,700, el cual será pagado en 5 meses, lo invertirá en la compra fr ropa usada, y golosinas en general

Gilma se siente muy contenta, sus negocios van bien y espera que para el futuro crezcan mas y así poder llevar una vida tranquila sin preocupaciones

loans.use: buying products liked used clothing and snacks

loans.name: Eloisa

texts.es:
Señora Eloisa belongs to “Banco Comunal Las Caribeñas”, located in Jr. Rio Pisqui 388, in the district Calleria, in theDepartment of Ucayali. She is 31 years of age, is married, has one son, and her husband works in masonry. Eloisa with the first loan received 300 Soles invested in a little convenient store.
